wathu niweswalata anathurudayaka gas kapa iwathkarannaathara manga natharawa thibena thudagalla adahanagaraye wadakatayuthu me wasara nimawimata pera awasan karana bawath ee sandaha rupiyal ekkoti this lakshayaka mudalak labi athi bawath palindanuwara pradeshiya sabhawe sabhapathi dhammika ranasinha mahatha pawasiya.ee mahatha ese kiwe pradeshiya sabhawe masika sabha raswimata sahabhagi wemini.raswima sabha raswim shalawe di pawathwini.dayal pushpa kumara mahatha (ejanisa)- handigalla pare kapat kirime wadakatayuthu nawathath nathara wela.

neluwa - lankagama - pitadeniya margaye prathisanskarana katayuthu themasak thula nima kirimatath, ehidi wana rakshithayata ho parisara paddhathiyata kisidu haniyak sidu nowiya yuthu bawath, janadhipathi gotabhaya rajapaksha awadharanaya kala.ee, ema marga prathisanskaranayedi sinharaja wana sanrakshithayata hani wanabawa widyuth mudritha saha samaja madhya magin pala wu pracharawala sathya asathyathawa siyasin daka widwathunge saha pradeshawasinge adahas wimasimata neluwa - lankagama pradeshaye janadhipathiwaraya ada (29) sidukala sancharayediyi.parisarawedin ella kala chodana samaga prathisanskarana katayuthu athhituwana lesa mita pera janadhipathiwaraya niyoga kara thibuna.prathisanskaranaya kerena margaya nirikshanaya sandaha  marga sanwardhana, wanajiwi saha wanarakshana, parisara saha adala siyalu amathyansha niladharin ekwa thibenawa.neluwa -  lankagama marga prathisanskaranaye di  sinharaja wana rakshithayata haniwana bawata pasugiya dina kihipaya thula wartha wuna.sinharaja wana rakshithaya ha margaya prathisanskaranayata lakwana gramiya pradeshawala parisara paddhathiya raka ganimin digu kalaka sita athi janathawage dadi awashyathawak wana margaye idikirim kalayuthu bawayi janadhipathiwaraya mehidi penwa di aththe.emenma parisarayata hani nowana paridi janatha awashyatha itukirima siya abhilashaya bawa da janadhipathi gotabhaya rajapaksha awadharanaya kala.lankagama gammanaya walagamba raja dawasa dakwa diwa yana ithihasayakata urumakam kiyana athara the wagawa pradeshaye pradhana jiwanopayayi.siyawasakata adhika kalayaka sita gamiyan sinharaja wana rakshithaya aasannaye wati athi margaye deniyayata saha neluwata the dalu ragena yanawa.

hethema indin athul kirima no iwasayida, athulwima no iwasayida, sitima no iwasayida, ganima no iwasayida awath no we. 67-71 ( mehi 62-66 chedawala ,mala , yanu wenuwata ,muthra , yanu yodanna ) 72-76 (62-66 chedawala , mala , wenuwata ,katin ,yanu yodanna ) 77-91( mehi 62-76 chedawala , manushya sathriyak , wenuwata ,noninda sitina manushya sathriyak, yoda gatha yuthuyi ) (methan sita cheda 15 n 15 ta cheda 62-76 yedimedi ,manushya sthriyak ,wenuwata yediya yuthu wachanaya sandahan karanu labe.) 92-106 ,manushyasathriyak ,wenuwata ,nidigath sathriyak , yodagatha yuthuya. 107 -121 mathwu sathriyak 122-136 umathu wu sathriyak 137-151 wisheshayen math wu sathriyak 152-166 marunu no dirunu sathriyak 167-181 marunu boho seyin nodirunu sathriyak 182-197 mari boho se dira giya sathriyak (, parajika papaya, wenuwata ,thulasi nam awatha we.
